item.title: IPFire 2.3 Beta 5
item.author: ms@ipfire.org (Michael Tremer)
item.description:
Dear Community!
This day, we released the fifth beta version of IPFire 2.3.
Further information and a discussion about that is to find in the forum: Click!
We hope that many of you will install this new version and give some feedback.

Michael for the team of IPFire

item.title: Presentation of our project on kbarthel.de
item.author: ms@ipfire.org (Michael Tremer)
item.description:
Dear Community!
Kim Barthel published on his blog a text about the project ipfire itself.
You may view the full (german, sorry) article on blog.kbarthel.de!

Thank you, Kim!

Michael

item.title: IPFire 2.3 Beta 3
item.author: ms@ipfire.org (Michael Tremer)
item.description:
Dear Community!
This day, we released the third beta version of IPFire 2.3.
Further information and a discussion about that is to find in the forum: Click!
We hope that many of you will install this new version and give some feedback.

Michael for the team of IPFire

item.title: Core Update 16
item.author: ms@ipfire.org (Michael Tremer)
item.description:
Hello everybody,
today we are going to release Core Update number 16, the following changes were made:
- Fixed Squid init script showing allready started during boot
- Fixed LineQualitiy Graph not working for some gateways not responding to ping request
- Fixed Outgoing FW Logging when using Mode 1
- Fixed Urlfilter autoupdate url has changed
- Fixed redirect wrapper not working as expected
- Fixed smaller CGI issues - for detailed informations see git
- Updated ntfs-3g to current stable

item.title: Article on www.linux-luenen.de
item.author: ms@ipfire.org (Michael Tremer)
item.description: Today, the linux user group from "Lünen" released an article about ipfire. to the article (german)

item.title: Core Update 15
item.author: ms@ipfire.org (Michael Tremer)
item.description: Today, we release the core update number 15. This is an important update because it will fix the latest dns vulnerabilities. Read this for more information. Please install this update as soon as possible.

item.title: IPFire's first rss feed
item.author: ms@ipfire.org (Michael Tremer)
item.description: Now, the ipfire project has got it's own rss feed. This feed is for you, to keep you up on latest security updates and releases.

item.title: IPFire 2.1 is out
item.author: ms@ipfire.org (Michael Tremer)
item.description: Today, we released the final version of "IPFire 2.1".
